summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, regarding overtime staffing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 9-10, 2019. It corrects earlier information about the number of staff hired for overtime and specifies which overtime shifts were voluntary versus mandated, with Correctional Officer Noel identified as the only mandated overtime on August 10.

persons.name: Noel
persons.context: Identified as the only staff member who was mandated for overtime on August 10, 2019, from 12 am to 8 am.

events.title: Overtime staffing at MCC
events.description: On August 9, 2019, from 4 pm to 12 am, there were 6 staff hired for overtime, all of whom were volunteers.

events.title: Overtime staffing at MCC
events.description: On August 10, 2019, from 12 am to 8 am, there were 10 staff hired for overtime, with 9 volunteers and 1 mandated (Correctional Officer Noel).

keyFacts: The email corrects earlier information, stating that on August 9, 2019, there were 6 (not 8) staff hired for overtime, all volunteers.
On August 10, 2019, Correctional Officer Noel was the only staff member mandated for overtime, with the other 9 being volunteers.
The email chain is dated August 14, 2019, and discusses staffing details from August 9-10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
